item.name: Mdisk Taxa de Leitura em MB
Mdisk tempo de resposta de Leitura
Mdisk Taxa de Escrita em MB
Mdisk tempo de resposta de Escrita

trigger_prototype.expression: {Storage IBM V3700 V7000:trade.stg[{$IP_STG} lshost {#HOST_NAME}].str(offline)}=1 or {Storage IBM V3700 V7000:trade.stg[{$IP_STG} lshost {#HOST_NAME}].str(mask)}=1 or {Storage IBM V3700 V7000:trade.stg[{$IP_STG} lshost {#HOST_NAME}].str(degraded)}=1
trigger_prototype.name: Status do Host {#HOST_NAME}: {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

trigger.expression: {Storage IBM V3700 V7000:trade.stg[{$IP_STG} systemstats cpu_pc].last(#1)}>90 and {Storage IBM V3700 V7000:trade.stg[{$IP_STG} systemstats cpu_pc].last(#2)}>90
trigger.name: Uso de CPU superior a 90%
